name: DailyPicture
0:
”Alexa, open Daily Picture”
”Show yesterday's picture”
”Set a reminder”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily picture
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Every day, Wikipedia highlights one of its best images from its large collection. With Daily Picture, Alexa will display them and read an informative accompanying description.

To see today's Picture, open Daily Picture or ask Daily Picture to show today's picture.
To see pictures from other dates, ask to show the picture for a particular date. For example, eg ask Daily Picture to show yesterday's picture; or ask for the picture for July 1st, 2020.
You can also instruct Alexa to show pictures from other days at any time from within the skill.
If you get stuck, just ask for help.

This skill is not associated nor endorsed with the Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
